thread.title: Great place to stay in London
thread.title_full: Great place to stay in London - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sorba21
title: Great place to stay in London
text:
Great location - Victoria Station, friendly, professional staff. Great rooms if you do not get the smallest. Worth paying a little more. Very nice lounge to have tea and bar for cocktails. Nice pubs within walking distance!
Room Tip: Do not get a room in the wings - it is a far walk to reception See more room tips
